welcome.title: Artyr Prydatko
welcome.subtitle: Front-end developer
welcome.description: I'm a Front-End Developer based in Sumy. I love travelling, photography & music.

about.title: About Me
about.description: <0>My name is Artur Pridatko. I started learning web development in 2019. I like to create simple interfaces that do complex functionality. I love experimenting with code, testing the best approaches, choosing modern practices.</0><0>Basically, I was engaged in the development of small e-commerce websites from scratch, applications for the delivery of food or services, CRM panels for accounting and editing of commodity items.</0><0>Most of the work I do with front-end rules, but I also do a little backend for handling requests, working with services.</0><0>In the course of my work, I understand well what the customer wants and try to find the best solution at a given time. I love my job and I want my customers to be happy too!</0>

resume.title: My Resume
resume.resume: <0>Development of e-commerce stores, CRM admin panels for managing products, websites, payment forms, authorization, work with setting up a site's SEO, google analytics and google tag manager.</0><0>Development of single-page and multi-page applications and web applications using modern development tools.</0>

0.description: I am developing e-commerce stores, making food delivery applications, developing a CRM website for product management.

1.description: I was engaged in adding new functionality for the application for the delivery of orders, implementing new features.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: <0>Here will be placed my projects, which I made to order or just for fun.</0><0>These are mainly commercial online stores, CRM admin panels, web and mobile applications.</0>

prising.title: Pricing Table
prising.description: <0>Here I have posted a price list for work related to my skills. There are three pricing options, choose the most profitable one.</0><0>We can always agree (:</0>
